remarks: Exercise: the integral of ` x |-> sin a x ` on an open interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
itgsincmulx.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
itgsincmulx.an0 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) $.
itgsincmulx.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
itgsincmulx.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
itgsincmulx.blec $e |- ( ph -> B <_ C ) $.
itgsincmulx $p |- ( ph -> S. ( B (,) C ) ( sin ` ( A x. x ) ) _d x = ( ( ( cos ` ( A x. B ) ) - ( cos ` ( A x. C ) ) ) / A ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d ph x $.
